amendment.description: To modify the study of marketplace fraud of traditional foods.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3287 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3287 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Heinrich to Amendment SA 3224. (consideration: CR S4713-4714; text: CR S4714) To modify the study of marketplace fraud of traditional foods.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3287 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3287 proposed by Senator Roberts for Senator Heinrich to Amendment SA 3224.
